attributes.action: engage in debates and discussions on the government's current nuclear policies and future plans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my opinion that the issue of whether or not Britain should renew its trident missile program is hardly recieving due attention. The estimated cost of £15-20 billion coupled with the moral issues of the possession of nuclear weapons should surely be reason for the government to take more consideration of public opinion, the finalising vote has not yet been cast and there is still time to stop the renewal.
